info.title: FreshBooks
info.description: FreshBooks is a cloud based small business accounting software. Send invoices, track time, manage receipts and expenses.

get.summary: When an invoice is created or updated
get.description: Triggers when a new invoice is created or an existing one is updated.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see this trigger, create or update an invoice.

get.summary: When an expense is created or updated
get.description: Triggers when a new expense is created or an existing one is updated.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see this trigger, create or update an expense.

get.summary: When a payment is recorded or updated
get.description: Triggers when a new payment is recorded or an existing one is updated.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see this trigger, create or update a payment.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all your expenses.

post.description: This operation creates a new expense in your account.

staffid.description: Pick the staff member to expense.

put.description: This operation is used to update an existing expense in your account.

staffid.description: Pick the staff member to expense.

put.description: This operation is used to delete an existing expense from your account.

post.description: This operation creates a new client in your account. At least one field of the client (i.e. first name, last name, organization, email, etc) must be specified otherwise the operation will fail.

id.description: Unique to this business id for expense.

markup_percent.description: Decimal, percent to mark expense up.

projectid.description: Id of related project, if applicable.

clientid.description: Id of related client, if applicable.

invoiceid.description: Id of related invoice, if applicable.

status.description: Value from the expense status table.

bank_name.description: Name of bank expense was imported from, if applicable.

updated.description: When the expense was last updated.

has_receipt.description: True if the receipt is attached.

ext_systemid.description: Id of related contractor system, if applicable.

transactionid.description: Id of related transaction, if applicable.

account_name.description: Name of related account, if applicable.

compounded_tax.description: True if tax 2 was a compounded tax.

accountid.description: Id of expense account, if applicable.

description.description: Description of first line of invoice.

language.description: Two-letter language code of the invoice.

fname.description: First name of the client on invoice.

lname.description: Last name of the client on invoice.

create_date.description: Date invoice was created, YYYY-MM-DD format.

due_date.description: Date invoice is marked as due by, YYYY-MM-DD format.

updated.description: Time invoice was last updated, YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format.

created_at.description: Time invoice was created, YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format.

date_paid.description: Date invoice was fully paid, YYYY-MM-DD format.

payment_status.description: Description of payment status. One of 'unpaid', 'partial', 'paid', and 'auto-paid'.

amount.description: Total amount of invoice, to two decimal places.
Amount paid on invoice, to two decimal places.
Amount outstanding on invoice, to two decimal places.
Amount of discount, to two decimal places.

type.description: Type of payment - Cash, check, credit

date.description: Date the payment was made, YYYY-MM-DD format.

amount.description: Total amount of the payment, to two decimal places.

updated.description: Time payment was last updated at, YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format.

username.description: Username used by client to log in.

id.description: Unique to this business id for client.

note.description: Notes kept by admin about client.

company_industry.description: Description of industry client is in.

username.description: Username used by client to log in.

accounting_systemid.description: Unique identifier of business client exists on.
